web-app:
xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_3_0.xsd" version="3.0">
Set Character Encoding org.apache.catalina.filters.SetCharacterEncodingFilter
encoding UTF-8
ignore false
Set Character Encoding /*
LoginFilter filters.LoginFilter
LoginFilter /*
DisplayUsersFilter filters.DisplayUsersFilter
DisplayUsersFilter /displayUsers
contains utilities.Utility boolean contains(java.util.List,java.lang.Object)
